div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
شهد الشّهود المسمّون في هذا الكتاب أنّ محمّد بن من سكّان نواية أقر عندهم وأشهدهم على
نفسه أنّه ــل وقــبض من يحنّس وإبرهيم ابني موسى متقبّلي
في أوّل بونه توبه من سنة أربع وثمانين ومائتن يدفع ذلك
إليهما أو إلى من يقــوم مقامهما في هــذه الضّياع لا يحتج في ذلك بحجّة على الوجوه والأسباب كلّها إلّا بالخروج
من هذا الدّينار تامّا وافيا وذلك لخراج سنة أربع وثمانين ومائتن
شهد بن ســلمة على إقرار محــمّد بن وكتب شهادته بخطّه وذلك
في شوّال من سنة أربع وثمانين ومائتن شهد يونس بن بن سلمة على إقرار محمّد
بن وكتب شهادته بخطّه وذلك في سوال ربيع من الأوّل سپه ارپع وپمأپپن وماثپن

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
šahida ăš šuhūdu ăl musammawna fī hāḏā ăl kitābi ʾanna muḥammada bna *** min sukkāni nawāyaẗa ʾaqarra ʿinda hum wa ʾašhada hum ʿalà
nafsi hi ʾanna hu **** ***l wa qabaḍa min yuḥannisa wa ʾibrāhīma ĭbnay mūsà mutaqabbilay
*** fī ʾawwali būnaha tūbiha min sanaẗi ʾarbaʿ:in wa ṯamānīna wa miʾatayni yadfaʿu ḏālika
ʾilay himā ʾaw ʾilà man yaqūmu maqāma humā fī hāḏihi ăḍ ḍiyāʿi lā yaḥtaǧǧu fī ḏālika bi ḥuǧǧaẗ:in ʿalà ăl wuǧūhi wa ăl ʾasbābi kulli hā ʾillā bi ăl ḫurūǧi
min hāḏā ăd dīnāri tāmm:an wāfiy:an wa ḏālika li ḫarāǧi sanaẗi ʾarbaʿ:in wa ṯamānīna wa miʾatayni
šahida *** bnu salamaẗa ʿalà ʾiqrāri muḥammadi bni *** ********* wa kataba šahādaẗa hu bi ḫaṭṭi hi wa ḏālika
fī šawwāl:in min sanaẗi ʾarbaʿ:in wa ṯamānīna wa miʾatayni šahida **** yūnusa bni ***** bni salamaẗa ʿalà ʾiqrāri muḥammadi
bni *** *** wa kataba šahādaẗa hu bi ḫaṭṭi hi wa ḏālika fī ø rabīʿa ø ăl šawwāl:in ʾawwali min sanaẗi ʾarbaʿ:in wa ṯamānīna wa miʾatayni

[In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.]
[The witnesses named in this deed have testified that Muḥammad b. So and So, one of the inhabit]ants of Nawâye, has acknowledged in their presence and has called them to witness as to his
[obligation, that ........................] . [and he has re]ceived from Yoḥannes and Ibrahîm, the two sons of Mûsâ, the two lessees
[......... in the firs]t (day) of Bûne of the year two hundred and eighty four; he will pay this
[to both of them or to those whoever should] stand in their stead in the[se] domains, he will not bring forward any pretext in respect thereto for whatever cause or reason there may be, beyond the paying to them
[this] dînâr full entire, and this for the impost of the year two hundred and eighty four.
[Witness is So and So, son of Sa]lama to the acknowledg[ment] by Muḥammad b. So and So ......] .................., and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting and this
[in Šawwâl of the year two hundred and eighty four. Witness is] ..... Yûnus b. ............ b. Salama to the acknowledgment by Muḥammad
[b. So and So, .........., and he has written his testimony] in his (own) handwriting [and this in Rabīʿ al-Aww]al of the year two hundred and eighty four. [b. So and So, .........., and he has written his testimony] in his (own) handwriting [and this in Šaww]âl of the year two hundred and eighty four.
